edu.mason.insf.ann
Class BaseNetwork

java.lang.Object
  edu.mason.insf.ann.BaseNode
      edu.mason.insf.ann.BaseNetwork
Direct Known Subclasses:
AdalineNetwork
public class BaseNetwork
extends BaseNode

A class that contains functions that would be needed by all types of neural networks.

setInputNodeValues

public void setInputNodeValues(Pattern<java.lang.Double> inputPattern,
                               boolean biasNodeAdded)
A function to set the values of the input nodes. This function takes a Pattern object of type double and a boolean. When the boolean value passed is True then a bias node will be inserted into the node list. No bias node will be inserted when the value is set to false.

Parameters:
inputPattern -
biasNodeAdded -

A function to connect nodes and links to a specified node.

node -

initializeLinks

public void initializeLinks(int numberOfLinks,
                            boolean addLinkForBiasNode)
A function to initialise a specified number of link objects for your neural network. The function also takes a boolean that determines whether an extra link gets added for a bias node or not.

Parameters:
numberOfLinks -
addLinkForBiasNode -

initializeNodes

public void initializeNodes(int numberOfNodes,
                            boolean addBiasNode)
A function to initialize a specified number of node objects for your neural network. The function also takes a boolean that determines whether an extra node gets added for a bias node of not.

Parameters:
numberOfNodes -
addBiasNode -
